extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Maya Mistry, Greta Yu, Michelle Li

      Constructor and Description
      Player(UltimateTicTacToeBoard b, GamePiece p)
      Constructor that passes through the UltimateTicTacToeBoard object and the GamePiece object to allow a human player to make a move on it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(UltimateTicTacToeBoard b,
              GamePiece p)
        Constructor that passes through the UltimateTicTacToeBoard object and the GamePiece object to allow a human player to make a move on it.
        Parameters:
        b - - board used to play the game
        p - - game piece used (x or o)

    • Method Detail

      • makeAMove

        public abstract int[] makeAMove(int[] moveRestrictions)
        Player makes a move on the board (must be valid)
        Parameters:
        moveRestrictions - - parameters of previous move
        Returns:
        int[] of parameters of the move just made

      • checkValidity

        public boolean checkValidity(UltimateTicTacToeBoard board,
                             int bigRow,
                             int bigCol,
                             int innerRow,
                             int innerCol)
        Boolean method to check if a player is allowed to make a move.
        Parameters:
        board - - Ultiamte TTT board
        bigRow - - row of TTT board
        bigCol - - row of TTT board
        innerRow - - row of game piece in TTT board
        innerCol - - col of game piece in TTT board
        Returns:
        isValid - if the move is valid (empty space and board not yet won)
